kche-tree/map_reduce.h File Reference

Template metaprogramming code for performing bounded and unbounded map-reduce operations with arrays. More...

#include "traits.h"

struct  kche_tree::BoundedMapReduce< T, D, BoundCheckFreq, i, NextCheck >
 Provide a bounded generic map-reduce operation over two arrays using template metaprogramming techniques. This version of the operation allows to check the boundaries in a specific frequency without the need of runtime conditionals. More...

struct  kche_tree::BoundedMapReduce< T, D, BoundCheckFreq, D, 0 >

struct  kche_tree::BoundedMapReduce< T, D, 0, i, nextCheck >
